resources.string:
Instructions 
- Press a button to apply the first label 
- Press matching labels simultaneously to apply other labels 
- If a label is a single letter, pressing will submit type letter 
- If a label is multiple letters, pressing will open that subtree of letters 
- Swipe up for shift (twice for caps) 
- Swipe left for backspace (bigger swipe for delete word) 
- Swipe right for space 
- Swipe down for symbols
